mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device (name, user_id, template_id, tags, config) VALUES (#{name}, #{userId}, #{templateId}, #{tags, typeHandler=top.nomelin.iot.common.handler.ListStringTypeHandler}, #{config, typeHandler=top.nomelin.iot.common.handler.ConfigTypeHandler})
mapper.update:
UPDATE device
name = #{name}, user_id = #{userId}, template_id = #{templateId}, tags = #{tags, typeHandler=top.nomelin.iot.common.handler.ListStringTypeHandler},
config = #{config, typeHandler=top.nomelin.iot.common.handler.ConfigTypeHandler},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.name, d.user_id, d.template_id, d.tags, d.config, gd.group_id FROM device d LEFT JOIN group_device gd ON d.id = gd.device_id WHERE d.id = #{id}
